lines.text: God dammit, Shelly, why do you always have to be such an asshole?
Sorry, and I'm not an asshole, I'm an actor.
Same thing.
How come you never scream when we have sex?
Give me something to scream about.

[sees Jason now wearing a goalie mask]
Who are you?
[Jason points a speargun at her]
What are you doing?
[Jason is still pointing the speargun at her]
Hey cut that out, that's not funny!
[Jason shoots Vera in her left eye with the speargun. She falls dead into the water. Jason casually drops the spent speargun to the ground and walks off]
Shelly, why aren't you at the lake with everybody else?
Oh, they said they were going skinny-dipping. I'm not skinny enough.
How do we do it?
Well, first we take our clothes off, and then you get on top of me or I can get on top of you.
I know how to do it, I mean, how do we do it in a hammock?

[Undressing]
Well, uh, I think you can figure something out.
I'll think of something!

[Shelly has accidentally reversed into and knocked over the gang's motorcycles with Rick's car]
Oh, shit.
"Oh, shit" is right! Let's get outta here!

[to Jason]
No! You *can't* be alive!
Look, I'm gonna go outside for a few minutes and then when I get back in we'll talk.
Yeah, sure. We'll talk... Bitch.
Would you be yourself, if you looked like this?
You son of a bitch! Come back here you bastards! You ain't getting away with this, God dammit!
Hey, the van's on fire!

[Finished syphoning Chris' van]
Take this to the barn, and start pourin' and, find Fox.
Whhhoooo!
[Swinging on a rope, at the barn]
What the hell you doin'? Get off that thing!

[Continues swinging]
Whooo! This feels gooooood!
[laughs]
Ali is gonna be pissed if he sees you screwing around. C'mon, we got shit to do.

[looks back up and sees that Fox as disappeared]
What the hell?

[Enters barn]
Fox? Where are ya? Stop screwin' around! You're messin' everything up! You're dead now, woman. Fox?
[Loco turns around and sees Fox's corpse hanging onto the rafter with a pitchfork. Then, Jason approaches Loco with a pitchfork, and impails it in Loco's abdomen]
Fox? Loco? Open, the damn door! Fox!
[Ali enters barn]

[the barn is silent, and not getting answers]
What the hell you guys doin' up there?
[Still no answer]
Hear me talkin' to you?

[Loco's corpse falls onto Ali]
FOOOOOOOOXXXXX!
[Ali sees Jason, jumping off a rafter]

[picks up a machete]
When I find you, you bastard, you're a dead man!
[Jason approaches Ali]
Shit!
[Ali swings the machete at Jason's head, but Jason duckes, and bludgeones Ali with a wrench]
Is that all you're gonna do this weekend? Smoke dope?
Yes?
Hi, Mrs. Sanchez. I'm Chris. We've come to pick up Vera.
She is not going!
[We hear people arguing]
What are they saying?
I don't know. I flunked Spanish.
[Vera comes outside, happily]
Hi, everybody. What are you looking at?
This was my bedroom. It's yours for the weekend.
Great.
[Chris looks outside the window and sees that the door of the barn is moving]
Chris? I don't mean to be picky or anything, but where's the bed?
[Chris is still worried]
Chris?
Oh. It's right here
[Chris shows the hammock to Debbie]
What's this?
It's your bed.
A hammock?
You might like it.
[Chris leaves the room]
Why not?
[Andy comes in]
Where's the bed?

[Vera and her mother are arguing]
What are they saying?
Don't ask me, I flunked Spanish.
